DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : Determine efficacy midodrine , selective alpha 1 adrenergic agonist , prevent neurally mediate syncope .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Study Midodrine , Alpha Adrenergic Agonist , Patients With Neurally Mediated Syncope
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind , crossover , placebo-controlled study . On day one , patient receive either midodrine placebo . On day three , patient receive opposite drug .
DOC.criteria: PROTOCOL ENTRY CRITERIA : Disease Characteristics Diagnosis neurally mediate syncope ( vasovagal fainting ) Sudden fall blood pressure AND Slowing heart AND Temporary loss consciousness AND Hemodynamic response head tilt Prior/Concurrent Therapy No concurrent adrenergic agonist antiagonist Patient Characteristics Fertile patient must use effective birth control
